text: Arlinda Dudaj (born 7 October 1977, in Tirana) is an Albanian publisher who currently serves as the president of "Dudaj" Publishing House. She is the co- founder of the "Albanian Book Association" along with Ardian Klosi and presently serves as the organization's chairwoman. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Albanian publishers (people) Category:People from Tirana Category:Publishers from Kavajë Category:1977 births
title: Arlinda Dudaj (Hovi)
